result.title: Help in "3720 â€” Highways"
result.content:
This is a problem from Central Europe Regional 2006. I've understood how and what dp[MAX][MAX] is calculated, but can't get my head around how ans[MAX][MAX] is calculated?

I can understand that ans[i][j] finds out all possible lines(without horizontal and vertical) from all points that can be drawn in (i*j) grid. But can't understand how's it working? Please help.

Code
